code: import{HistoryManager,URLParam}from'../app/History';export var isKioskMode=function isKioskMode(){var urlParams=new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);return urlParams.get('kiosk')==='true';};export var getFocusSelector=function getFocusSelector(){return new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get(URLParam.FOCUS_SELECTOR)||undefined;};export var unsetFocusSelector=function unsetFocusSelector(){HistoryManager.deleteParam(URLParam.FOCUS_SELECTOR,true);};export var getExperimentalFlags=function getExperimentalFlags(){var flags=HistoryManager.getParam(URLParam.EXPERIMENTAL_FLAGS);if(!flags){return[];}return flags.split(',');};export var hasExperimentalFlag=function hasExperimentalFlag(flag){return getExperimentalFlags().includes(flag);};export var getSpanId=function getSpanId(){return new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get(URLParam.JAEGER_SPAN_ID)||undefined;};export var getTraceId=function getTraceId(){return new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get(URLParam.JAEGER_TRACE_ID)||undefined;};export var setTraceId=function setTraceId(traceId){if(traceId){HistoryManager.setParam(URLParam.JAEGER_TRACE_ID,traceId);}else{HistoryManager.deleteParam(URLParam.JAEGER_TRACE_ID);}};
